body.raw:
{
    "active": true,
    "source": "INTERNAL",
    "cfr": "{{assetCFR}}",
    "name": "Test Name",
    "countryCode": "ROU",
    "imo": null,
    "externalMarking": "ExtTest",
    "hasIrcs": "Y",
    "ircs": "{{assetIRCS}}",
    "hasLicense": false,
    "powerMain": null,
    "grossTonnage": null,
    "grossTonnageUnit": "LONDON",
    "contact": [],
    "producer": {
        "code": null
    },
    "notes": []
}

    "externalMarking": "ExtTest",

    "powerMain": null,
    "grossTonnage": null,
    "grossTonnageUnit": "LONDON",
    "contact": [],
    "producer": {
        "code": null
    },
    "notes": []
}
